lines.text:
[to Karen]
Fine, don't believe me, just wait until he kills you.

[trying to get out of the basement]
Brenda! I have to pee!
Squat and do it down there.
The cops will find traces of urine, it won't add up when were supposed to have been murdered in our beds!
It's because you're still a virgin that you're so upset.
I'm upset because my stepfather just tried to kill my mother.
I'm not kidding, your father's over at our house investigating it right now.
